content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_projectDB;


select zones_data.Borough, count(*) total_number_trips
    from OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/trip_data_green_delta/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'Delta'

    )as trips_data

join 

OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
         FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) as zones_data

on trips_data.PULocationID =  zones_data.LocationID
group by zones_data.Borough 
order by count(*) desc ;
